Container.Name: SWAMI
Container.Overview: SWAMI is a lightweight, browser-based catalogue for your Movies directory. No scraping, instant filters, and one-click updates. Setup with READ ONLY access to your library

Config.Name: Web Interface
Config.Description: Port for SWAMI web UI. Choose a free/unused port

Config.Name: MOVIE_PATH
Config.Description: Must be the same value set on 'HOST path to Movies folder' for SWAMI to work

Config.Name: FILTER_LABELS
Config.Description: UI filter labels (comma-separated). These will be filters that appear in the Web UI

Config.Name: REMOVE_LABELS
Config.Description: Labels to ignore (comma-separated). These will remove entries containing these labels from the catalogue

Config.Name: CATALOG_PATH
Config.Description: Where SWAMI stores its catalogue files. You shouldnt need to change this variable

Config.Name: FLASK_PORT
Config.Description: You shouldnt need to change this. Internal Flask port (matches port mapping)
